content.json:
# Netskope Events
The Netskope Events workbook has the following components:
### Network Events: 
Provides insight into cloud firewall and network private access events.
### Application Events: 
Provides insights into application usage; specifically by devices, users, users and traffic patterns.
###  Security Alerts: 
Provides visibility into security incidents and violations and the ability to identify effects of a breach.
### Web Transactions:
Provide granular information about the web sites that users have accessed.

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count() by device_s
content.title: Device Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count() by os_s
content.title: OS Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count() by browser_s
content.title: Browser Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count() by ccl_s
content.title: Cloud Confidence Level Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count() by activity_s
content.title: Top Application Activities

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count() by app_s
content.title: Top Applications Accessed

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count() by Category
content.title: Top Applications Categories

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application" and ccl_s == "poor"
| summarize Count = count () by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), app_s
content.title: Top Applications Accessed by Users with Poor CCI Over Time

items.name: Applications Accessed by Users with Poor CCI

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "application"
| summarize Count = count(access_method_s) by user_s, access_method_s
content.title: Top Users by Access Method

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "page"
| summarize TotalBytes = sum (numbytes_d/1024/1024) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), app_s
| top 10 by TotalBytes
content.title: Top Applications by Traffic Volume

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "page"
| summarize TotalBytes = sum (numbytes_d/1024/1024) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), user_s
| top 10 by TotalBytes
content.title: Top Users by Traffic Volume

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| summarize numbytes_d = sum (numbytes_d/1024.0/1024.0) by app_s
content.title: Top Private Applications by Total Bytes

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| summarize client_bytes_d = sum (client_bytes_d/1024.0/1024.0) by app_s
content.title: Top Private Applications By Uploaded Bytes

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| summarize server_bytes_d = sum (server_bytes_d/1024.0/1024.0) by app_s
content.title: Top Private Applications By Downloaded Bytes

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| distinct policy_s, app_s
| summarize count = count() by policy_s, app_s
content.title: Most Used Policies

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| project TimeGenerated, network_session_id_s, user_s
| summarize NetworkSessions=dcount(network_session_id_s) by bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain}), user=user_s
| top 10 by NetworkSessions
content.title: Top Users By Session Count

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| project TimeGenerated, network_session_id_s, app_s, dsthost_s
| summarize AppSessions=dcount(network_session_id_s) by dsthost_s
| top 10 by AppSessions
content.title: Top Applications By Session Count

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| summarize AppHit = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), app_s
content.title: Private Applications and Policy Hits

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL 
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| project TimeGenerated, user_s, app_s
| summarize UserCount=dcount(user_s) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), app_s
content.title: Daily User Count for Private Applications

items.name: Daily User Count for Private Applications

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != "" and action_s == "allow"
| summarize TotalBytes = sum (numbytes_d/1024.0/1024.0) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), app_s
content.title: Top Private Applications Traffic Volume

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL 
| where event_type_s == "network" and publisher_name_s != ""
//| summarize any(dstport_d) by dsthost_s, ip_protocol_s
| distinct publisher_name_s, policy_s, dsthost_s, dstport_d, ip_protocol_s
| sort by publisher_name_s asc, dstport_d asc
content.title: Private Applications Ports

parameters.name: SourceIP
parameters.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where srcip_s  != ""
| summarize Count = count() by srcip_s
| project Value = srcip_s, Label = strcat(srcip_s, " count: ", Count)
parameters.label: Source IP

parameters.name: SourcePort
parameters.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where srcip_s  != ""
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All")
| where srcport_d  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by srcport_d
| project Value = srcport_d, Label = strcat("Port: ",srcport_d, " count: ", Count)
parameters.label: Source Port

parameters.name: DestinationIP
parameters.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where dstip_s  != ""
| summarize Count = count() by dstip_s
| project Value = dstip_s, Label = strcat(dstip_s, " count: ", Count)
parameters.label: Destination IP

parameters.name: DestinationPort
parameters.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where dstip_s  != ""
| where (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All")
| where dstport_d  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by dstport_d
| project Value = dstport_d, Label = strcat("Port: ",dstport_d, " count: ", Count)
parameters.label: Destination Port

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| summarize Count = count() by ip_protocol_s
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Protocols

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where access_method_s != "null"
| summarize Count = count() by  access_method_s
| order by Count
| take 10
content.title: Top Blocked By Access Method

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| summarize Count = count() by dst_country_s
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Destination Countries

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL 
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where dst_country_s == '{selCountry}'
| project src_country_s, dst_country_s, dst_region_s, dsthost_s, dstip_s, dstport_d, ip_protocol_s, policy_s, access_method_s, traffic_type_s, user_s, userip_s
//| take 10
content.title: Show Blocked Details by Country

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| summarize Count = count() by dst_region_s
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Destination Regions

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where dstip_s  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by dstip_s
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Destination IP Addresses

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where dstport_d   != "null" 
| extend dst_port = tostring(toint(dstport_d))
| summarize Count = count() by dst_port
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top Blocked Destination Ports

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where srcip_s  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by srcip_s
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Source IP Addresses

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL
| where event_type_s == "network" and action_s == "block"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where srcport_d != "null" 
| extend src_port = tostring(toint(srcport_d))
| summarize Count = count() by  src_port
| order by Count desc
| top 10 by Count desc nulls last
content.title: Top Blocked Source Ports

content.query:
Netskope_Events_CL 
| where event_type_s == "network" and traffic_type_s == "non-web" and action_s == "allow"
| where (srcip_s in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (srcport_d in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (dstip_s in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (dstport_d in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where policy_s != "default" 
//| summarize count()  by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), policy_s
| summarize count()  by policy_s
content.title: Non-Default Firewall Policies Getting Triggered

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_s == "yes"
| summarize Count = count() by alert_type_s
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Alert Type Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| summarize Count = count() by app_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Applications by Alerts

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| summarize Count = count() by alert_name_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Alerts

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| summarize Count = count() by user_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Users By Alerts

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| summarize Count = count() by src_country_s
content.title: Alerts Location by Source Country

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), alert_type_s
content.title: Alert Types Over Time

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count(malware_type_s) by malware_type_s
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Malware Types Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count(activity_s) by activity_s
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Malware Activities Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count() by malware_name_s
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Malware Names Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count() by malware_severity_s
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Malware Severity Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count() by file_type_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Affected FileTypes

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count() by app_s
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Malware Incidents by Applications

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count() by user_s
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Users Triggered Malware Events

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), malware_name_s
content.title: Blocked Malwares Over Time

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Malware"
| where malware_name_s == '{malware}'
| project TimeGenerated, user_s, app_name_s, activity_s, detection_engine_s, detection_type_s, file_name_s, file_type_s, malware_severity_s, malware_name_s
content.title: Blocked Malware Log Details

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "malsite"
| summarize Count = count() by malsite_category_s
content.title: Malsite Blocked by Category

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "malsite"
| summarize Count = count() by severity_level_s
content.title: Malsite Blocked by Severity

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "malsite"
| summarize Count = count() by malsite_country_s
content.title: Malsite Blocked by Destination Location

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "malsite"
| where severity_level_s == '{severity}'
| project TimeGenerated, user_s, url_s, malsite_category_s, malsite_country_s, malsite_ip_host_s, threat_match_value_s, severity_level_s
content.title: Malsite Incidents Details by Severity Level

items.name: Malsite Incidents Details by Severity Level

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "malsite"
| summarize Count = count() by user_s
content.title: Top 10 Users Accessing Malsites

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "malsite"
| where user_s == '{user}'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), user_s
content.title: User Accessing Malsites Over time

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by app_s
content.title: DLP Incidents by Applications

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by dlp_rule_severity_s
content.title: DLP Incidents By Severity

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by activity_s
content.title: DLP Incidents by Activity

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| where dlp_rule_severity_s == '{severity}'
| project TimeGenerated, dlp_rule_s, dlp_rule_severity_s, dlp_file_s, object_type_s, activity_s, user_s, from_user_s
content.title: DLP Incididents Details by Severity

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by os_s
content.title: DLP Incidents by OS

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by dlp_rule_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 DLP Rules Triggered

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by dlp_profile_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 DLP Profiles

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by user_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Users Triggered DLP Events

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by dlp_file_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 DLP Incidents by File

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by policy_s
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 DLP Incidents by Policy Voilations

items.name: Top 10 DLP Incidents by Policy Voilations

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "DLP"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), policy_s
content.title: DLP Incidents by Policy Over Time

items.name: DLP Incidents by Policy Over Time

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Compromised Credential"
| summarize Count = count() by alert_name_s
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Compromised Credentials by Source of Info

items.name: Compromised Credentials by Source of Info

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Compromised Credential"
| project breach_date_t, alert_name_s, breach_description_s, breach_id_g, breach_score_d
| top 10 by breach_score_d desc
content.title: Top 10 breaches by Breach Score

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "Compromised Credential"
| project TimeGenerated, alert_name_s, user_s, breach_id_g, breach_date_t, breach_score_d, matched_username_s, breach_media_references_s, breach_target_references_s
content.title: Compromised Credentials

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "uba"
| summarize Count = count () by activity_s
content.title: Anomalies by Activity

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "uba"
| summarize Count = count () by app_s
content.title: Anomalies by App

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "uba"
| summarize Count = count () by Category
content.title: Anomalies by Category

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "uba"
| summarize Count = count () by alert_name_s
content.title: Anomalies by Alert Names

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "uba"
| where alert_name_s == '{alertname}'
| summarize Count = count () by TimeGenerated, srcip_s, user_s, from_user_s, app_s, severity_s, alert_name_s
content.title: Users by Anomaly Alert Name

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "uba"
| summarize Count = count () by severity_s
content.title: Anomalies by Severity Level

content.query:
Netskope_Alerts_CL
| where alert_type_s == "uba"
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), severity_s
content.title: Anomalies Over Time

content.query:
Netskope_WebTX_CL 
| summarize Count = count() by x_c_browser_s
content.title: Browser Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_WebTX_CL 
| summarize Count = count() by x_c_device_s
content.title: Device Breakdown

content.query:
Netskope_WebTX_CL 
| summarize Count = count() by cs_host_s
content.title: Top Hosts

content.query:
Netskope_WebTX_CL 
| summarize Count = count() by x_cs_app_s
content.title: Top Apps

content.query:
Netskope_WebTX_CL 
| summarize Count = count() by cs_method_s
content.title: HTTP Methods by Names

content.query:
Netskope_WebTX_CL
| where cs_method_s == '{method}' and x_cs_app_s == '{app}'
| summarize Count = count() by TimeGenerated, cs_username_s, x_cs_app_s,cs_method_s 
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Users by App and HTTP Method

items.name: Users by App and HTTP Method

content.query:
Netskope_WebTX_CL
| summarize TotalBytes = sum (toint(bytes_s)/1024.0/1024.0) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), x_cs_app_s
content.title: App Traffic Volume
